spec_data.Name: perl-Geo-METAR
spec_data.Description:
Geo::METAR is Perl module for accessing aviation weather information.
Referring to things like a cloud altitudes, temperature, wind, dew point,
and so on.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:52:00 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl module for accessing aviation weather information
